comment.body:
Did they elaborate on that? How is it not the right time? 

Anyway, you are doing great work! Zeronet seems far more usable than any of the other attempts to decentralize the net.
Well according to [this comment](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=14041596) Zeronet is hardly ready for the mainstream. It still has a lot of bugs to deal with.
you can expose the IP on Zeronet_ if you really want to. It doesn't matter, ISP is logging your traffic as well. Use a VPN or Tor if you are worried. Mastodon is still better than Facebook.
I do not understand how these hubs work? Can I change hubs? Do I subscribe to hubs?
the joke is that American military just drone bomb everything and claim the targets was terrorist regardless of what other says and what amnesty international claim.

@Flyman: Sure, military personnel has themselves said that the cameras on drones where so bad, that at a time everybody with a beard in Pakistan in some areas was in danger of being killed, because they could easily be mistaken for well known terrorist.
war is love, love is beautiful. It is  the love for Syrian children that fuel this war.
@Border0464fred: but an anarcho-socialist bisexual underwater city would be awesome.
I appreciate you sharing this. There doesn't seem to be any coverage in the mainstream media in my country.
